titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Bertrand Russell, 9. 2. 1919
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original in The Bertrand Russell Archives der McMaster University; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (Letters, S. 66; deutsch: Briefe, S. 84; Cambridge Letters, S. 107; WiC, S. 87).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: Dear Russell, I don't know your precise address but hope these lines will reach you somehow. I am prisoner in Italy since November and hope I may communicate with you after a three years interuption. I have done lots of logikal work which I am dying to let you know before publishing it. Ever yours
